root: ^I can't stay here anymore. Let's go.
^But you're not dressed for the cold outside. You should wear something warmer. My jacket, in my room, will keep you cozy..
^Do I have to? I think I’ll be fine.
^We are not stepping out until you put on a proper jacket. Please, fetch it from my room..
^Don’t make me have to use my stern voice on you.
^(Player goes back upstairs and into the parent's bedroom)
